Shivah:

Shivah arrived where Sagnus was "I'm SHivah "said the blue trasmetal 
three head dragon "Who're you?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- The Dark Avian ---
> 
> The Dark Avian's sensors pick up the Decepticon signature of a 
> new bot in Hawaii. The red light in the control room flashes and 
> beeps to alert Decepticons that a new member has awakened. The 
> message is then sent to Megatron.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> On 11 May 2001, at 14:50, Ragnus _ wrote:
> 
> > In what will be the hawaiian Islands in the future a tectonic
> > disruption awakens a volcano that has been dorment for nearly a
> > century.
> > 
> > But that is not all it awakens...
> > 
> > The massive energy released from the blast brought online a system
> > that was on standby for decades before.  The first system's 
reactivity
> > brought online the massive computer that was Ragnus.
> > 
> > The behamoth rose slowly, as his joints had not been moved in many
> > years.  Spreading his wings to thier full thirty two foot span his
> > external sensors came online revealing to him the interior of the
> > volcano.  Looking up at the mouth of the volcano he crouched low, 
then
> > using his powerful legs, projected himself upwards.
> > 
> > As he cleared the volcano's mouth he spread his wings once again, 
only
> > this time with the lightning speed he knew he was capable of.  The
> > escaping gases propelled his huge form upwards with great speed. 
> > Looking around he scanned for a fresh energy source.  Locating 
one a
> > few miles to the south he set himself in that direction.
> > 
> > The robotic Red Dragon that was known as Sagnus had finnally 
risen.
> >
